item.title: How to start with Deep Learning
item.author: Author
item.description: Embracing the hype Nowadays, everyone is talking about Artificial Intelligence. Whether understands it or not. This discussion essentially comes down to two terms: Machine Learning and Deep Learning. Machine learning (ML) is the study of computer algorithms that improve automatically through experience and by the use of data. Deep Learning is a type of Machine Learning based on Artificial Neural Networks with multiple layers. Artificial neural networks (ANNs) are computing systems inspired by the biological neural networks that constitute animal brains.
